name: Meltdown (itch) (BahmGames)
description:
This game is an entry for Mini Jam 100 About:
  • The Nuclear Reactor's cooling systems are overloaded! The only way you can stop it is by manually cooling the core through the core's control terminal!
  • In accordance with the "Chaos" requirement implemented by the jam, the environment and game will get more hectic the higher you let the core temperature get!
How to Play:
  • To keep the core from exploding, you must keep its temperature BELOW 1500 degrees
  • To restore the core to stability and win the game, you must cool it down to 700 degrees
  • The core is cooled by typing in the phrase on the instruction screen
  • All you need to do to enter the phrases is hit the appropriate keys
  • Note that it is NOT case sensitive!
3rd Party Assets Used:

SimpleFX - Unity Asset Store

Sounds and music - Humble Bundle
